thread.title: Your Stomach Acid Can Power a Whole Bunch Of Really Cool Gadgets
thread.title_full: Your Stomach Acid Can Power a Whole Bunch Of Really Cool Gadgets

author: Christa Sgobba
title: Your Stomach Acid Can Power a Whole Bunch Of Really Cool Gadgets

organizations.name: university of maryland school of medicine

text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
ID Your Dog’s Mood Ever wish your could gauge your dog’s mood just by a quick glance? Well, some people think they can : Empathetic people interpret dogs’ facial expressions more intensely , researchers from the University of Helsinki. Still, it’s possible they over-interpret what the dogs are feeling —and it’s not clear how accurate their perceptions really are, the scientists say. 
Banish Back Pain There may be a drug-free way to calm your aching back: yoga. After analyzing the results from 12 studies, researchers from the University of Maryland School of Medicine determined that yoga slightly reduces pain in people with chronic, non-specific back pain . More research is needed to confirm whether it can help for a sustained period of time. 
Watch Your Weight Want a baby soon? Your weight—and your partner’s—might be holding you back. Couples with BMIs of 35 or greater took 59 percent longer to get pregnant than those of normal-weight BMIs. This shows that it’s not just the woman’s weight that matters when trying to conceive. 
Breathe Easy Pollution may come with a surprising side effect: High exposure to tiny air pollution particles can raise dementia risk by 90 percent , researchers from the University of Southern California discovered. These particles—say, from power plants and motor vehicles—are easily inhaled because they are so small, which is why they may be dangerous to health.
